short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export B2B leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator to CSV/Excel. Extract peoples from LinkedIn Sales Nav, Save B2B Leads with clean data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Verified B2B leads from Sales Navigator.

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API
- Support Email finder provider, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

v1.1.2 change logs
- Fixed the performance issue.
